name: Space Swarm (Aniol92)
description:
Play in fullscreen for the intended experience.

----------

Save the galaxy from the evil mecha-spider! It won't be easy, you'll need to collect energy in order to grow your swarm and defeat all adversities in your way!

Controls:

- WASD or Arrows to move

- Click on the different spaceship buttons to create them

Art and Design by: Samuel Moya

Dev and Tech by: Aniol Andrés
